explanation: [0-0] In a kitchen, a man is sitting at a table, wearing a black shirt and purple bear eye mask. In front of him is an empty blender. A woman in a red shirt stands behind him, holding a fish in her right hand and a string of sausages in her left hand.

[0-5] The woman waves the fish and sausages up and down. The man raises his right index finger and points at the fish. The woman puts the fish into the blender. Then, the woman holds a watermelon in her left hand and an eggplant in her right hand, waving them up and down. The man raises his left index finger and points at the watermelon, and the woman puts the watermelon into the blender.
